<script type="text/javascript"> 
var embed = '<embed src="/i/sw.swf" quality="high" bgcolor="#ffffff" width="100%" height="100%" wmode="transparent" name="Swap" align="middle" allowScriptAccess="sameDomain" allowFullScreen="false" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer" />';
var flash;
var win_dow ;

function _flash(){
var h = (win_dow.height()-120);
h = (h<570)?570:h;
flash.css({
		width:win_dow.width()-win_dow.width()*0.15,
		marginLeft:-((win_dow.width()-940-win_dow.width()*0.15)*0.5),
		height:h
	});
/*
$(".main_descr").css({
		width:flash.width(),
		marginLeft:-((win_dow.width()-940-win_dow.width()*0.05)*0.5)
	});
*/
}

$(document).ready(function() { 


flash = $(".flash");
win_dow = $(window);
embed= '<div id="bg-body"></div>';

_flash();

flash.html(embed);

$(window).resize(function(){_flash();});

var srcBgArray = new Array(
		"/i/main-1116/1.jpg",
		"/i/main-1116/2.jpg",
		"/i/main-1116/3.jpg",
		"/i/main-1116/4.jpg",
		"/i/main-1116/5.jpg",
		"/i/main-1116/07141.jpg",
		"/i/main-1116/07143.jpg",		
		"/i/main-1116/26.jpg"
	);

	$('#bg-body').bcatBGSwitcher({
			urls: srcBgArray,
			speed: 5000,
			alt: ''
		});	

var IE6 = false /*@cc_on || @_jscript_version <= 5.6 @*/;
if (IE6){
flash.css({marginLeft:'0'});

$(".main_descr").css({marginLeft:'0'});

$("#n").css({
		position: 'relative',left: '50%',marginLeft: '-470px'
	});
}
		
});




</script>
